body: We the people demand that the United States flag be flown at half mast in honor of one of our nation's great heroes, CPO Chris Kyle. Chief Petty Officer Kyle saved countless lives of the troops he served with in his tours overseas. He served this country with honor in his military career and continued to help his fellow veterans after his discharge. This man is one of this nation's great sons and he deserves this nation's respect. We ask that the flag be ordered to half mast for a period of one week in honor of a hero.
title: Fly the flag at half mast for the Navy SEAL and American hero, Chief Petty Officer Chris Kyle.
